website_summaries.verdict: Big unit that looks great and makes presorting easy. The best value laundry hamper on the market.
pros: Looks great and has two, large compartments so sorting clothes is easy
cons: Construction isn't quite as solid as some of the more expensive units

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! I've had it for almost two years now and it has held up beautifully. I don't have much closet space and it's so discreet sitting under my window. I followed the suggestion of other reviewers and bought two hampers from Walmart to put inside the sections, making doing laundry A BREEZE. No more dreading the sorting process haha. Honestly couldn't be happier with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Hamper Helps to Limit Smell of Dirty Clothes
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to any bathroom. Especially if you have two teenage boys that really know how to get the most amount of money out of your washer and dryer setup. It's easy to assemble. The lid stays on pretty well with the magnet lip to minimize smells. The mesh bags come out pretty easy. If I were to nitpick, I might find little baskets to put in place of the mesh bags which might make soiled clothes extraction slightly easier. Currently the mesh bags stay in place by attaching to the long velcro strip inside the hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Candle Harlot

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting and Nice Looking!
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this for over a year and it's still in perfect condition. I didn't want an unattractive laundry bag in my bedroom, and this blends perfectly with the neutral and brown tones of my decor. I love that it has a divider and I put little baskets from the local dollar store inside for transporting a heavy load to the washing machine. I highly recommend and wouldn't hesitate to buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: I Just love This!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to store my yarn in because I am overflowing with skeins and tired of looking at my collection in plastic bags, zippered bags, etc. I only ordered one to see how well it would serve my needs. I love this hamper! It isn't too large, yet holds a lot. I plan to order two more and that should hold everything I will need for quite a while without having to worry about "where am I going to put this?' It is well made and quite heavy. I have those small fabric cubes, but they are lightweight in comparison to this one. I was quite surprised when the box arrived. Very sturdy indeed!!
customer_reviews.author: Vineyard Girl

customer_reviews.title: This is way overpriced and missing the.....
customer_reviews.text: Whatever board or partition os inserted in the bottom. Its material grade seems too cheap and its not as it looks in its picture. I am disappointed with this purchase and the packaging for Amazons upscale service and prime especially is a further disappointment! DO NOT BUY I shouldve gone bamboo anything but, this product! FYI its cover is an insult and very cheap grade and setting and the first to go when it falls apart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like in the picture, great size and color,  but...
customer_reviews.text: The size and color are great! Lots of room for my kiddos clothes and their linens. It did come with two mesh bags for the interior I presume which was a pleasant surprise. However, there is no "hook and loop" attachment for the back part of the magnetic lid closure. It is velcro. Also something to think about is that there is only fabric on the bottom, so lifting the hamper altogether when it is full may rip the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: cleuz61

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Flimsy, Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these a few years ago and really liked them. They were sturdy and held up over the years. I ordered a new one to go in a different room but the product had changed. It's no longer sturdy - it's actually really flimsy. There's no hard bottom in it, the top comes off easily and it has a hard time keeping shape (it comes folded, and tries to fold in on itself a lot). I'm disappointed with the changes, especially since the price has stayed the same. It's not worth the money in my opinion. Not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I bought two since I'm a slob when it comes to my cloths. They hold about two small loads or one mega load each. I like how the hide my laundry compared to an open basket. The lid I like least it's just a cardboard covered flap with a magnet. It's not a cat friendly surface but I'm sure she will figure that out. If you want a larger basket buy this. If you have the space buy two like I did. I bought mesh bags that's why you see the clips in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Retta

customer_reviews.title: Missing magnetic closure!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. Amazon replaced but the same product was shipped. No magnetic closure like promised. There are NO magets sewn into the base to connect with even though they were sewn into the lid of the laundry basket. I purchased the chevron pattern and its a nice pattetn. Too bad! Customer service not great either.
customer_reviews.author: ArizonaSunnyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for hiding laundry! I wanted a more discreet way to hold dirty laundry and this is great! It's sturdy, blends in with my decor and I couldn't be happier. I also took the advice of another commenter and bought the two white "pop up" hampers at the dollar tree and they fit perfectly inside this hamper. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Everest

customer_reviews.title: Simple Easy Solution
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laundry bin to replace a mesh collapsible one that was falling apart. It assembled easily & quickly. The removable mesh liner attaches to the bin via velcro tabs on that outside of the bin, and the top portion of the liner folds over the outer lip of the bin to keep it from falling into the bin when clothes are tossed in. My only suggestion to the manufacturer would be to change the velcro tabs so that they are on the inside of the bin instead of on the outside. Otherwise, it works well and helps to keep the closet a lot more tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ligos

customer_reviews.title: Hamper works... Liners(bags) not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Should've probably gone with the single... I don't use the mesh/net liners, because only half of it adheres to the hamper with velcro. So, if you don't carefully put your clothes into it, the other half usually bunches up or falls in on itself preventing anything further from entering the bag. The hamper itself though, seems sturdy enough so far. Reason I wanted the metal handles, so can just carry it instead of using the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Nice hamper! Instructions would be nice and a sturdier bottom.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking useable hamper, decent sized and not too tall. There were no instructions and I'm not exactly sure where all the Velcro on the inner mesh bags get attached. Nice handles on the sides but the bottom liner is pretty thin and I wouldn't recommend carrying it around full. It would be nice if the inner mesh bags Velcro attached completely on the inside so none of it is seen on the outside or maybe a hook and loop hanging method?
customer_reviews.author: Redned

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, but the look of it is nice.
customer_reviews.text: The color and texture was perfect. But the lid didn’t fully cover the hamper at all. The sides are revealing when the the lid is closed. The magnetic flap on the lid will be hard to attach to the hamper If it is filled with clothing. “Filled” meaning Preferably a 1/2 load Or one load should Be stored in this hamper. Loads may vary depending on clothing type or children’s clothing. For the price not worth it........But the look makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Authentic M

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for the second time five years later!  Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering and I am very pleased. It is the quality you would expect for the price you are paying. The last set latest me 5 years and would have latest MUCH longer had my cat not used the lid as a bed and created a huge dent/dip. The top is fabric covered cardboard but the magnet keep it closed and each side hold an extra large size load of laundry. I purchased two so I can keep four loads of laundry septated: darks, blacks, whites & towels. Last time I ordered off Wayfair but this time Amazon was cheaper and it was the same brand with different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wolfgang

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, good looking, has two compartments and a magnetic flap
customer_reviews.text: What is roomy, good looking, has 2 compartments and 2 handle holes, stands in the corner and has a magnetic flap? You are absolutely right, it's the Double hamper by Household Essentials. It fits tons of small to medium sized laundry in 1 compartment, and maybe 1-2 comforters in the other (depending on the comforter's size, ours fits two 6x7 comforters in 1 compartment easily and if you want to abuse the hamper, you can shove a third one, but then the top will not close properly).
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in 2015 and I am buying another one for my in-laws now. Ours is still in perfect condition! It holds lots of clothes and hides dirty laundry smells without keeping the smell in it. We have moved three times since we got it and it’s never been a problem to move around. Easy to fold and put away when needed it. Not a pretty color but since it’s inside our closet it doesn’t bother me at all. The downside of it is that it gets super heavy with clothing in it so you can’t easily push it from/to the laundry room. Other than that my husband and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angy

customer_reviews.title: Worried me at first but...
customer_reviews.text: The package for this resembled a boxed painting. I was slightly concerned how this was going to turn into what I ordered. Once opened it made sense. Although it's a fabric bottom, it is sturdy. The hamper is divided into to compartments, that was an added plus. Looks nice and the lid stays shut by use of magnets. If it can hold the weight of this fat cat that lays on it who thinks I work to pay his mortgage then it's very sturdy. This is a quality product. ++** Not a discount for a review purchase**++
customer_reviews.author: MG III

customer_reviews.title: 2 versions- the one that comes with hamper nets sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2- first one is great, the other I just got is flimsier, cheaper fabric, and collapses in on itself in the front and the lid barely hangs on. I don’t understand why they are different. The second one that I returned came with hampers that Velcro to 2 sides, which is actually just a giant pain since it falls in easily and is hard to put back so you’re better off getting the 14 inch high hampers. I really wanted 2 of these but don’t have the time or energy to keep buying and see if I get the better one.
customer_reviews.author: Tuffman

customer_reviews.title: Great bin for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace one of those tall white flimsy plastic bins that we all knew from college. Putting it together was a breeze. I use one side for clothes & other for towels. Never been able to fill it up completely & I only do laundry every other week. Other reviews mention molding, but never had that issue. Maybe people are just putting wet/damp clothes in it or keep it in the bathroom? CONS *liners seem flimsy & I worry it’ll rip so I use a different bin to carry laundry around *bin itself isn’t the sturdiest, you can’t put anything too heavy on it
customer_reviews.author: mangoladyy

customer_reviews.title: mesh bags are worthles
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these three months ago. Within a month, one of the laundry bags ripped right under one of the handles. I tried to sow it back together, but the mesh is not strong and keeps ripping back open. Last week the same thing happened to the second one. The hamper its self is very nice, but the mesh bags are very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah V.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks and its price point is perfect. The hamper is great have two sides to sort clothes before washing. The lid is magnetic and is the perfect strength. I've had this for 4 years now and is is great shape still. You could use it without the lid as it just velcro along the back side. I really love this hamper.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Household Essentials Double Hamper vs Honey Can Do Double Hamper
customer_reviews.text: I actually looked at this Household Ess. model (14 x 24 x 26 in), as well as the cheaper Honey-Can-Do HMP-01367 Resin hamper (25.5 x 25.5 x 1 in). I finally settled on this one because of higher positive reviews on Amazon (4.5 stars: 1,069 customer reviews) versus the Honey's (4stars: 532 customer reviews). Also, I didn't like the cheap Velcro tacks Honey had in the front to hold down the lid. I also took heed of previous reviews, and purchased two Deluxe Pop-up Laundry Hampersthat fit like a glove. See pictures for the measurements. Overall, I'm pleased with the products. Household hamper seems sturdy and of quality. And I love how the pop-up laundry hampers fit nicely in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ajaa957

customer_reviews.title: A Marvelous And Attractive Hamper for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive hampers and assemble in just a few minutes. You merely unfold them and slip the divider down the middle panel.And they have removable netting style bags. And when you don't need them, they easily come apart and can be stored flat against the wall in a closet or behind a door. They are marvelous.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K. Pavlick

customer_reviews.title: Great dependable buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for years! I didn't know I could even pull this up for review. This is still sturdy and it still looks new. It fits well in my daughter's closet and it holds a lot of clothes. Great buy that we are still using over 5 years later.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Don't let this product 'hamper' you - avoid it altogether
customer_reviews.text: Really awful product. No exaggeration this is one of the worst products I have purchased on Amazon. First off, no handles. Who doesn't make a hamper without handles? Makes it very difficult to transport to the laundry room. Second, very poor stitching on the exterior of the lid. The stitching was coming apart when I took it out of the box. In addition, the magnets to keep the lid closed came loose inside their sleeve, making this feature worthless. Finally, the zippers at the base were also poor quality and did not close properly and jammed. Don't waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kepamo

customer_reviews.title: Great for light use, or a stationary spot
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice little laundry basket, but I wouldn’t suggest it if it will be getting heavy usage, and will be carried around a lot. It is very easy to assemble, but the handles are very flimsy, and will break off real soon. After the handles break off, it’s a matter of time before the material around the handle frays, and the handle hole gets too warn out to carry
customer_reviews.author: JimJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Hamper
customer_reviews.text: The hamper is a little flimsy but it certainly does the job to segregate out dirty clothes. In order to not have to move laundry to and from an additional basket I put two pop-up hampers inside (one in each section) and they work great. The 2 Pack - SimpleHouseware Mesh Pop-Up Laundry Hamper Basket With Side Pocket, Black are the perfect size for this hamper.
customer_reviews.author: s87

customer_reviews.title: Makes sorting clothes a breeze. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second double hamper. This is now a must and has become automatic to separate whites and darks. My hubby has caught one right away. When clothes look like getting 3/4 full, pull one load of whites or darks out into laundry basket and off to be washed. I like the magnetic strip to keep lid in place. The handles on the side are nice if you have to move hamper anywhere. The fabric is smart looking and easy to wipe down if needed.
customer_reviews.author: J'town Momma

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed...
customer_reviews.text: I had a very specific set of criteria for our bedroom hamper: size, lid, color, etc. Needed either two small hampers or one bigger one with two sections. This one fit every single one of my criteria, despite my skepticism upon opening the package. It's working out great, holds a LOT more clothes than it seems to (each half holds more than a laundry-load's worth of clothing), and now we can separate our colored/dark clothes from the whites/lights at bedtime, making it easier for me to grab the clothes from either side already sorted and ready to wash. Fits in the space we needed and looks unassuming and doesn't draw attention to itself.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Au

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced and reasonably functional
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive hamper is relatively easy to assemble and a reasonable size. It aesthetics are not displeasing. It'd probably be a little better were it to come with, or have a means for attaching, a removable bag. The lid is the one weakness for this product. Attached via a velcro strip, it's not the kind of thing that can support its own weight. So you either have to hold it up or remove it entirely when taking laundry out. It's inexpensive, but does the job. If you're looking for something that will aesthetically pass a closer examination there are better hampers, but it isn't as cheap-looking as others.
customer_reviews.author: Arius

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected, better looking than expected
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I didn't know if this would look good, be big enough, or hold up. But it is made out of better material than I expected. It also looks good. I have it in my bedroom, and it is easy to just toss clothes in it without anyone knowing this is a clothes hamper. I got the double hamper, and it can hold quite a bit of clothes. I wasn't expecting it to be this big.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: sturdy laundry basket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when it was $24 (woo!) back in December '17 and it's been working great for me! I grabbed the double laundry bins and it's been so handy compared to only using a laundry bag. It came with two bags as well which I use to carry clothes down to the laundry room, but this doesn't seem super durable or practical for folks who don't live in a place with washer/dryers. Might want to find a more sturdy bag. Also the magnet isn't working, but it doesn't affect the lid staying on the basket so I can look past it.
customer_reviews.author: olivia w

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Bill
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why laundry baskets seem so costly, but they are. Finding one that doesn't seem miniature sized is a challenge as well. This laundry basket fit the bill. It's larger/taller than most and also priced right. Having the divided two sections and bags that store the clothing and make transporting to the laundry easier are an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: AmazinAmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: I mostly like this product.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product now that it's assembled... There were some issues with assembly because seams not straight and corner not true. Used diagonal zipper to square box, but zipper cheap plastic and one of teeth bent so difficult to square one side. The size is generous. Easily fit in entire basket of clothes into each of the two sides. The look is clean, I may install a small hinge inside the lid as you can't keep the lid up , it just Velcro's on to the back of the unit so is a bit floppy. This is lightweight so it easily moves to clean around.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Great hamper.
customer_reviews.text: Color worked out well for us as it matches our furniture. Not the sturdiest of hampers. Will probably start to fall apart if your the type of person that likes to overfill and push down on your clothes to fit more in it. If you just drop them in it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT B.

customer_reviews.title: Large hamper. Glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say I like this hamper so far, its sturdy and it came with 2 mesh bags. I did order the mesh hampers to place inside this hamper, however I don't need it, but will hold on to it just incase. It's big enough to hold a large amount of laundry. This is a large hamper and it wasn't that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is the perfect size and I no longer have to manually sort through the laundry because of the dividers inside. I would like to add that I bought this because I was looking for a hamper that would help me teach my son with special needs how to separate and wash his clothes so if there are any parents out there in the same boat, you won't regret this purchase. It also has a bag attached in the middle that can store soiled items and the best part is that the lid is magnetic so there won't be any bad smells throughout the room if someone doesn't close it all the way cause it "seals" on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Latonya Rader

customer_reviews.title: Has worked well for 3+ years
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 years ago and has worked well. The walls are pretty stable, and we can even put some lightweight items on top (towel, clothes for after shower, and small box of bath bombs). Unfortunately, doesn’t come with inner laundry bag. Dimensions fit pretty well in the few different places we’ve tried it, but might be even better if it was 2 inches smaller in depth from wall.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Seems just kinda okay-ish. The fabric is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems just kinda okay-ish. The fabric is a bit pinched in the front-middle-bottom on mine (i.e. defective), but I don't care enough to bother getting an exchange. It's quite a bit heavier than I expected, as the side walls actually have some kind of board inside them to give them rigidity (I assume particle board, but I can't see as it's stitched inside the fabric). There is a VERY strong chemical smell, which hasn't fully dissipated yet in about a week - I suspect it's from the bonding agent used in the particle board, assuming that's what it is. I am expecting the smell to fully dissipate given some more time.
customer_reviews.author: Emissary

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic handles laughably "attached" with fold-in tabs... temporarily
customer_reviews.text: cheap chromed plastic handles are 2-pieces held together with fold-in tabs. within days, handles will split. within a week or two, handles can no longer be re-attached because thin metal fold-in tabs will be exhausted with metal fatigue. the material in which the hole for the handles is cut is very sharp and can slice your hand once the handles have worn out and missing. total garbage. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: mike d

customer_reviews.title: Needed something quick
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this because it is gray, hold more clothes, keeps our clothes separate, and came quickly. IT was easy to assemble. I like the sheer bags that come inside the hamper. We have a 3 story town house so this is extremely helpful when taking our clothes down to the 1st floor. The only thing is.. the lid rips off if you open it all the way.. It's a bit flimsy.. it serves its purpose though, and it looks nice in out bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great solution!
customer_reviews.text: After a move, I needed a covered triple laundry sorter nice enough for our bedroom. As I researched, I found them to be very expensive ($150+) AND have very mixed reviews. None were very big, and made smaller with removable bags. I came upon these, and decided to line up 3. They look and work great and - bonus - are easily carried to the laundry room without need for a separate basket. Very happy with this solution!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: We’re very happy with this laundry hamper. Holds our darks on one side and whites on the other. We also accidentally threw away the middle piece thats supposed to keep it sturdy, and it holds up just fine without it. We’ve had it for a few months and love it!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: nice double laundry hamper
customer_reviews.text: after not being able to find a double laundry basket in stores, i ordered this one online. it is a nice size and fits in my closet. i followed the suggestions of other reviewers and got a mesh hamper to put in each side. works perfectly and when i go to the laundry room i just take out the mesh hamper. the product did smell a little funky at first but it has gone away now. it is sturdy enough that my cat can jump on it and the lid doesn't fall in.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: So So. Cumbersome, No Carry Handles. No bags or Inserts.
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is pretty flimsy. It is large, and while that is good, there is no handle to grab the unit by. Very cumbersome to carry to and from the laundry room. I tried to find some bags to either slip inside or drape over the compartment lid, but it is an odd size, and I could not find a suitable match. They need to cut some handles in on either side, and include some sort of removable inserts so you don't have to try to fumble this thing down the steps!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Look great, work well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, and they work very good, and look really nice. Each compartment is pretty big.. no reason for any clothes to be laying around the bed or floor, it's able to hold everything good. The lid on the back is attached via Velcro, that's probably the only negative, but doesnt really matter, no velcro is showing, or gets caught on any clothing. I might purchase some liners for the insdie though, so that I can easily bag up laundry and bring it down to laundry room. I give these 10/10. Work great, look good, and pretty reasonably priced. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: DaMioN

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for 6 months now and the laundry bags themselves are starting to rip. The overall assembly is pretty straight forward but definitely does feel a little cheap. Overall a decent price but nothing outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hamper!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a hamper for my studio apartment. This one works great for small spaces, and you can keep this outside of your closer without people even knowing that it's a hamper. I even use the top as a temporary table sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Tanvir Talukder

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I had a wicker basket that I loved, but my wife and I have lived together for going on 4 years and if we can combine our assets, I guess we can share a laundry hamper. I measured the dimensions of the space and this product seemed to fit the bill, plus it's on that perpetual lightning deal, so I went for it. The first one they shipped me was ripped, the packaging was pristine, but the product was damaged, that was a first. I assembled it and I was disappointed, velcro and magnets and zippers... This would be great for a kids room or dorm it is not a "household" essential
customer_reviews.author: thomas noble

customer_reviews.title: so if you don't like to lean down to the ground to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: It comes laying flat, and I thought it would take some "time" before it took the shape that was pictured. So I was pleasantly surprised that by zipping the two enclosures at the bottom made it "pop" into formation! Took me maybe a minute to get it sitting up with the lid on it. It is fairly deep, so if you don't like to lean down to the ground to get the clothes on the bottom of the hamper, I recommend a laundry bag as a liner so you can simply pull the clothes out and then carry them to the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Large compartments.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Looks so much better than your typical plastic or wicker basket. Hamper is over sized which may not work in a tiny bedroom. However, it would make a fab storage container for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: IndyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fair deal for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice in my room and I like that you can separate lights and darks within the same hamper. I was actually pleasently surprised that it has some weight to it for a hamper that requires minamal assembly and folds up. PRO TIP: Buy two of the collapsible foldable hampers size 14" x 14" x 24" to go on the inside for easy removal of laundry when it's time to wash. The lid removes (must be for packaging reasons) and has a magnet to keep it closed. My only hang up on it is that the fabric isn't sown very taught in the front. Not a deal breaker though...I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Lewis

customer_reviews.title: #1 Hamper in My Book
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect size and sturdy hampers with divider. The lid attaches easily with velcro and magnet front so it's easy to flip open or close to keep dirty laundry from sight. Heavier than it looks, but stays put when it's filled up. The bottom zips up and plastic-y if you ever had to shake it out or wipe it down. I bought matching pair for master closets plus another tan one for the laundry room. I wish they came in other colors, but super pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Xtina

customer_reviews.title: Way too big - quality ok
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is just ok. The black inserts they send for the 2 compartments is convenient but they seem to flimsy and the Velcro doesn't see to be the best quality. I am only using one side right now barbecue new baby still has not arrived but I am not too happy about how the lid doesn't close properly and it seems it sink in on one side. Way bigger than expected so I feel like its just a huge bulky item taking up way too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Betancourth

customer_reviews.title: Lookin’ Good there, Hamper ;)
customer_reviews.text: What an approvement over our old IKEA plastic hamper. We separate adult and kids clothes. Handles work great and are positioned really well with smooth metal edges. My only gripe is that the lid flap doesn’t sit close enough to the hamper wall for the built in magnets to actually work. Hence the 4/5 rating.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Should have returned this item.
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered as a gift. The hamper is a great size. The chevron pattern was on this item so crooked that I was shocked when I saw it in the home of the reciever. Quality control was sleeping at the wheel at this manufacturing place.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: This is great, and I love the magnetic lid closure
customer_reviews.text: This is great, and I love the magnetic lid closure. Not having to see the laundry has made my laundry room look much cleaner. It comes flat, and you just zip up the bottom sections to make it stand up. One of my zippers was defective, so the bottom doesn't zip all the way. It doesn't really matter, since it's sitting on the floor...the laundry isn't going to go anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: BallroomPadawan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase but I suggest putting a foldable hamper inside.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am pleased with this hamper. I just wish it had a removable basket that came with it so you can take the laundry to the washer. I like the fact that this looks more fashionable than regular hampers. I do recommend this product to fashionably “hide” your cloths but I would suggest buys a foldable bag to go inside. Now I just have to find a quality foldable hamper bag,
customer_reviews.author: SiscoKid

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I had something similar before, purchased at a chain type storage store; different manufacturer and half the width. After 5 years of use it finally split apart. Been looking around on the internet for a while for a replacement. I was happy to find this one, wider, and also in the same color and type of canvas fabric. I didn't want a heavy duty framed hamper. Set up was super simple, remove the packing, zip the bottom and pop into place. Fits perfectly into the space and for the price if it even lasts two years, I'm fine with that.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice and Holds A Lot
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Hubby even built a cart with wheels on it so I could easily roll it down to the laundry room when it was full. The only problem I had, was someone set something heavy on the lid and it cracked inside the fabric. So now the lid sinks in. Wished it had been a bit sturdier. Otherwise great basket that looks nice and holds a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy La Joice

customer_reviews.title: This is nice - it is WAY bigger than I expected it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is nice - it is WAY bigger than I expected it to be. It doesn't fit in the closet space I wanted it to, but it does hold a lot more than I expected which is a plus. Looks like a gray/taupe color linen(pretty much like it's pictured - sometimes hard to tell). Folds flat easily for storage if you're not using it at some point. Love the magnet lid that closes easily - great for homes with kids (aka: 3 boys). Also love the 2 compartments for lights/darks. At my house, it's too big to be a bathroom or closet hamper, but works nicely in a bedroom and looks nice/discreet enough to be out.
customer_reviews.author: Lilac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I live in a senior high rise where bed bugs are rampant. To help stave off these creepy, blood sucking, night crawlers I've been taking off my clothes at my door; putting them in a plastic bag. Bags of clothes in plastic bags on the floor don't look good. This hamper is exactly the right size, exact to the color in picture and has a magnetic flip lid. I saw one at Walmart with a Velcro lid. I hate Velcro; it catches the clothing. Anyway I can now hide my bags of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Sand

customer_reviews.title: Great double hamper
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is very sturdy, sturdy enough that my cat has made the lid his favorite place to sleep. I replaced two collapsible hampers with this one and I'm glad I did. They stopped holding their shape and this one has no issue. My daughter works in a coffee shop so it's great that I can wipe down the liner to remove the smells her work clothes create. The lid has a magnetic closure, but can also be removed completely. I would definitely buy another of these.
customer_reviews.author: Vic S

customer_reviews.title: Just one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just the one I bought but it had a very strange smell. It's not a terrible smell, it kind of smells like pepper. I aired it out but it still smells a little. It wasn't bad enough to return, but that's why I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5. Also, didn't realized when I ordered, but it comes with two netted bags to use!
customer_reviews.author: catch me at the movies

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected. I thought it's a bit more sturdy, as I have double that looks like it and it's hard and sturdy. For this one lid is keep talking inside and doesn't stay closed. I bought it for kids room, so was hopping it to be like the one I have, but unfortunately it is worse quality...
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy; you can safely stack all your college textbooks ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy; you can safely stack all your college textbooks atop it. The two removable mesh bags are each attached by two anchor points using fairly durable Velcro. The magnetically sealed lid offers a good seal which prevents the escape of odors. I am in love with the chic styling!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hamper, made well
customer_reviews.text: Love this hamper. It looks so nice in my bedroom, don’t even know it is a hamper. It is made well for the money. I put it together in a few minutes. Love the Velcro mesh inserts, they are nicer than I thought they would be and easy to take in and out out and they have handles. The only issue was the magnets move around when closing it, so they don’t necessary connect to the other magnets, but it still closes and not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Nice but pricey
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this hamper. I love the fact that it closes, but not tightly. It looks great in the laundry room, or the closet, and you can sort laundry into the two sides. One side full equals 1 load in my oversize washer. I don't use the hamper for wet laundry like towels and rags, or even very sweaty athletic apparel, since I'm afraid that laundry would mildew. I use a mesh hamper for wet dirty clothes. This hamper is pricey for a hamper, but it is hard to find something nice like this.
customer_reviews.author: Janjanjan

customer_reviews.title: Love this laundry hamper
customer_reviews.text: Love this laundry hamper. I use it to separate my regular laundry from my delicates. I aired it out for a day or two outside before I brought it into my room so I didn't experience an overwhelming odor like some other people did. It is surprisingly heavy to carry when its full of clothes though, and the bottom surface seems a little to thin to drag it. Overall, I'm pretty satisfied with my purchase. It does what I need it to and it looks better in my room than the spring kind I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Aline H.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very sturdy and well-made, looks like it belongs in a home-decor magazine with it's metal-lined handle and great design. Putting it together takes 20 seconds. Cons: My only gripe is that the fabric on the front sags (ends up wavy specifically on one side while the other half is taught), so the facade isn't as smooth as pictured. I'm afraid over time it will just get worse? PS if you have cats, this is pretty much a giant scratching board so be prepared for that! Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: the hamper is sturdy, and material seems to be durable
customer_reviews.text: the hamper is sturdy, and material seems to be durable, however: - black color is not black but rather charcoal grey (at least I got a dark dray one when ordered black) - the lid fixture velcro strap is way too small for such a big lid - > hence cannot just leave it open hanging - it comes off - the two inside nets (net-bags) for laundry are nice with handles but again fixing them to stay inside the bin compartment is a challenge..
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Witch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, nice color
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper. The color is perfect for my wood paneled apartment. The hamper size compartments are perfect sizes so that once the clothes reaches close to the top, it's one load in my washing machine. I bought cotton laundry bags from Amazonand they fit nicely in this hamper. I had to use 6 binder clips to hold the bags open in the hamper. The hamper is easy to assemble (zipper on the bottom is all you need to close).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used in my nursery. Sturdy, well made and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my nursery. It comes folded down, and is easy to pop up and is really sturdy once you do! It is very attractive, and appears well made (not cheap looking like some fold down hampers). I only wish that it had a liner that could be removed for washing (I didn't feel that this was enough of a negative to take a star off, though). The top stays shut because there is a magnet under the lip. I would recommend this to a friend/family member.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The mesh liner has velcro on one side under one handle but nowhere else. No instructions AT ALL. I only gave it 3 stars because it's attractive. Otherwise, you won't be able to figure out (easily) how to use the mesh liners and it doesn't stay opened up unless it's full of clothes. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa, where's my stuff?

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT Hamper!!!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't be happier with this laundry hamper. SO simple to set up, very well made, and sturdy. A perfect size that tucks in nicely and hides beside our 6 drawer dresser, but still looks very classic and modern instead of an eye sore sitting in our bedroom. We also love the 2 separated compartments for whites & darks...no more wasting time sorting them. Plus, it's an awesome price....we looked at tons of these all over, and could not beat this price, especially for what you actually get!
customer_reviews.author: Vince C

customer_reviews.title: Great Hamper!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what I wanted for my narrow hallway! The bathroom is too small for a hamper and the hallway always got cluttered with a basket of dirty clothes. This perfectly fits and the clothes are hidden away until laundry time. It was very easy to assemble, looks nice and is pretty sturdy. Which is a good thing, because my large cat has made the top his new laying spot.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted! Solid, covered. Best part? The removable hampers inside. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: jen smithmay

customer_reviews.title: Great product and definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that this version of the hamper doesn't have any handles. The single hamper had the handles I wanted but I really like this size. It fits in our closet and looks nice. The lid is convenient when you want to have your closet (or wherever you put it) look nice and clean. I do laundry often enough it has never been full but it has a lot of room if you don't do laundry multiple times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Simple, great price, nice design!
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research before purchasing this hamper and I am very pleased! It was simple to assemble, I like the look of it, and it stays closed. I followed other reviewers recommendations of also purchasing laundry sorters for the insides, this makes it easy to get the clothes out so I don't have to bend over. Some reviewers said there was a bad smell- mine had no smell at all. It is surprisingly sturdy for such a simple design and is working exactly as I hoped!
customer_reviews.author: debimustard

customer_reviews.title: Neat, convenient, and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love! The hamper fits a great deal of clothes and it looks neat in the room. Its light and durable. There's also holes for handles for easy carrying! I am really glad I got it. The lid is removable if that's more your style.
customer_reviews.author: taj17

customer_reviews.title: Has completely fallen apart after 7 months use.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom has come off, the handle came off in front and the sides are ripping apart. I only carry this about 20 feet down the hall once a week to the laundry room. I am baffled by the way it has disintegrated.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kurz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Teen
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy enough for my son's clothes. The item came as described and took 1 minute to put together. Textured material sure looks better than a plastic laundry basket full of teen clothes! Now I just hope he uses it. The flap magnets are missing but that's no biggie. I'm pleased with this product, quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: 2busy4bs

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. The folding top piece is a little wider than it needs to be and runs over the sides of the hamper when the lid is closed. It almost looks like they mis-measured it when they designed it, but I'm sure it wasn't a mistake I just don't understand for the life of me why they would make it that much wider. It was a lot bigger than I thought it would be, even when I measured it out w/ measuring tape before I bought it. It just doesn't seem 26 inches is that tall but I assure you it's an ample sized hamper for a single person, even two.
customer_reviews.author: David Shi

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easy
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble; however the silver handles fall off constantly, and the handles themselves are placed in inconvienient spots. I wouldn't purchase this again; it's really not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: VGSB

customer_reviews.title: Nice hamper
customer_reviews.text: This hamper was purchased to replace a 30 year old hamper. While the old hamper was still doing it's job, it was time to update. The hamper was easy to set up and did initially have a smell similar to sawdust. I was expecting this due to other reviews. I just set it outside for a couple of days, sprayed it with Febreeze and the smell did go away or was at least no longer noticeable. The two sections are nice for separating colors so I don't have to when it's time for washing.
customer_reviews.author: dtkfw

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased ☺️
customer_reviews.text: Very nice laundry bin. Some customers stated they had to buy inserts to easily remove items. Mine actually came with mesh inserts with handles. They Velcro to the sides and hold up with it full. The lid is held on by a large magnet strip in the back and a small one in the front to easily open. This has been very sturdy after a few months of use and it looks really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: xoxolaura3

customer_reviews.title: Functional and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This foldable laundry hamper is large enough that it rarely overflows. There is just my husband and I; a family of more people would need additional hampers. It did have the strange fabric dye smell that others have mentioned, so I put it on the patio in the sun and breeze for a day and the smell faded considerably. You can't stack stuff on the lid or it will collapse. The hamper feels like rigid, cloth-covered plastic or cardboard. It fits in nicely with my decor. It isn't too modern or too old-fashioned. The solid sides hide the dirty clothes and everything looks neater. Plus it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Really like this hamper
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hamper. The fabric is really nice and with the top down it doesn't took like a hamper, it looks like furniture. I bought two mesh laundry bags to go inside because this doesn't have wheels and that was ok with me. I can see using this for years!
customer_reviews.author: V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: people think this thing is nice looking and the fabric does look quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow, people think this thing is nice looking and the fabric does look quality. And its very sturdy for being fold-able. I could eat dinner on the folded top. Fits about 1 weeks of a couples laundry. (for me at least) I wish there were hooks for laundry bag, and the magnets are not strong enough to go through the bag's fabric. I didn't expect these features, so I won't it. Maybe I would go 4.5 stars if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: Tom John

customer_reviews.title: High End Look on a Budget
customer_reviews.text: The hamper is easy to set up, and comes with two inner bags that Velcro on. It looks classy and modern. It’s also easily collapsible just by removing the board from the center pocket. Removing a star for sending me two different colors even though I specified both to be the brown coffee linen
customer_reviews.author: wereferret

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wished the mesh inside was had more grip when you spread it inside the hamper but overall I'm happy with the item. It's pretty big, holds up pretty well considering it's a break down kind of thing and it hold up to four piles of laundry in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Genbon

customer_reviews.title: Good design, but does not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: The hamper is well designed. It has 2 compartment so items such as towels can be separated from clothes. The only problem is, is that it is made of cheap material and it does not last. On the other hand it doesn't cost that much either. If you don't mind that it won't hold up for the long run, it might be a good buy. Building a hamper with this design might be a good project for a woodworker if you want something that last. Be sure to use a light weight wood such as birch.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hampers.  Also not as painful to look at as most hamper setups.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of the single hampers because according to the stated dimensions, combined they would have more capacity than the double unit. Also easier to pick up and move around. Considering buying one more.
customer_reviews.author: 40 oz. Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent hamper. it looks nice. It is fairly sturdy. It folds up if needed so anything that folds is not super solid. The top attaches with velcro on the back side and is magnetic on the front, the lid is sturdy enough to put things on top. I would have preferred if the top was attached to the unit itself rather then with velcro. What I don't understand is why the bottom is a flimsy vinyl plastic with two zippers, what is the point of that? It should have had a bottom made of the same material as the rest of the hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Best hamper I've found in here
customer_reviews.text: Can't say anything bad. Sturdy construction, comes with bags. It didn't have any instructions, so it took me a half minute to figure out how to put it together. Did a lot of research on here to find a good one and I did.
customer_reviews.author: Matty Lin

customer_reviews.title: Netting is cheap and doesn't hold much before breaking but it still is useable without.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product and, on the same day, the mesh/net insert separated itself at the handles from the weight of an admittedly generous amount of laundry. I could understand if it was after a period of uses, but not on literally the first one. That being said, the collapseable shell is sleek, feels durable, and could make do without the netting. This fact, combined with an easily replaceable component somewhat saves this product in my eyes but there's probably better quality products to choose from out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How many times do you need to fold it up?
customer_reviews.text: The size and color was perfect. It comes folded flat. Too bad the hinge is stitched and the lid does not sit straight on top. Plus, if you get it filled with clothing, the sides start to push out, on the fold lines, and the lid does not cover it. Metal handle came loose and I had to re-install the handles. I would have liked the sides to be solid and the hinge stitched better to sit straight and hold it closed tight.
customer_reviews.author: CoastalGuyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of different hampers and decided to go with this one based on the price and that it has 2 compartments. Makes it easier to keep my lights and darks separated so I don't have to do that when i go to do laundry. It doesn't look as nice as some hampers in the $100 price range, but doesn't look bad and looks fine in my bedroom or bathroom. It's constructed simply, but works well. Overall, it does well for what i bought it for. I may get something fancier in the future, but this is great for comparably low cost.
customer_reviews.author: michael mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: The product works as it should BUT it smells horrible. There insides are made of some cheap wood like cardboard and smell terrible. I was hoping this was all plastic and fabric but no. It's some off gassing cheap wood and requires airing out for a few weeks or lots of deodorizers to make it work in a house with asthmatics. This isn't cool, I was coughing and sneezing while setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Miss

product_meta.title: Household Essentials 5614 Double Hamper Laundry Sorter with Magnetic Lid, Brown Coffee Linen
product_meta.description: Color:Brown| Style Name:DoubleHousehold Essentials Double Laundry Sorter ensures your laundry chaos is attractively tamed. With 2 compartments to simplify the sorting process, you can discreetly contain your linens until washday. A removable lid with magnetic closure on the front side and hook & loop on the back keeps everything under wraps and out of sight. Lined with moisture resistant polyester, this sturdy sorter provides an appealing alternative to an open basket, giving you a place to sort laundry and keep it out of sight. With simple lines, a compact design, and a clean look, it accommodates almost any decor, from retro to organic. Household Essentials Double Laundry Sorter's flat-folding structure lets you tuck it away entirely when it is not in use; so give laundry a place and optimize your space and make it look good, too.
feature_bullets: 2 compartment free standing laundry hamper with lid helps simplify the clothes sorting process for everyone in the family
Includes detachable lid with magnet flap for secure closure after you sort your laundry and grommet handles for transport
No tools assembly : Easily folds open to put into use and quickly folds flat for storage when not in use
Durable laundry basket is made of long lasting polyester linen fabric
Measures: 26 inch h x 24 inch w x 14 inch d

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,134 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
